text: The North Carolina General Assembly 2019–2020 session was the state legislature that first convened in January 2019 and concluded in December 2020. Members of the North Carolina Senate and the North Carolina House of Representatives were elected in November 2018. ==House of Representatives== The House of Representatives leadership and members are listed below. ===House Leadership=== ===House Members=== Speaker Tim Moore Minority Leader Darren G. Jackson The following table shows the district, party, counties represented, and date first elected of members of the House of Representatives. {| class="wikitable sortable" ! District !!
